title: Authors and Citation
text: Caprarelli L (2022). praiseme: Deliver Prasie Someone. https://github.com/luke4157/praiseme, https://luke4157.github.io/praiseme/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {praiseme: Deliver Prasie to Someone},   author = {Luke Caprarelli},   year = {2022},   note = {https://github.com/luke4157/praiseme, https://luke4157.github.io/praiseme/}, }

title: Deliver Praise — praise
text: name text string; Name person wish praise. punctuation text string; punctuation provided end statement.

title: Deliver Praise — praise
code: praise(name = "Steph", punctuation = "!") #> You're the best, Steph!
